channel.title: Recruiting For Garkova
channel.description:
Dear Members, I Have Made a New Forum & Need Some Staff Members! I'm Not Braking The Rules Because Theirs No Link In My Thread.
Garkova Is a New Forum For Everything You Can Think Of! General Forum, Online Game Cheating/Hacking, Graphics, Coding & Loads More.. The Forum Is Free To Join :) & Its a Good Forum.
The Forum Owners - Owned By Me MrHax
Im Recruiting For Members That Can Help The Forum. E.G > Privaleged Users. The Forum Software Is vBulletin & Has a 2 Nice Skins You Can Choose From. I Have Installed Some Mods - Such as The Arcade System, vBplaza - Soon To Be Released.
Interested In Becoming a Moderator? Then Register on The Forum & Get 50 Posts - This Isnt Much For Moderator Status! Yeah Its Free. The First 3 Members That Get 50 Posts Get Moderator Status! So You Should Join Right Now!
Once You Have 50 Posts Please PM 'MrHax' Over Our Forum. Please Note - You Should Not Spam The Forums Or You'll Be Banned.
You Must Follow The Forum Rules Or Your Chances Of Becoming a Moderator are Real Low!!
To Go To Our Site Please Go To The Link In My Signature.
Thank You, 'MrHax'
Note To Mods - This Is Not Breaking The Rules. No Link In The Post![br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 12:16:11 PM[/size][hr]Is Bumping against the Rules?
